name: Phemie's Fable
description:
Play as Phemie, the dragon koi, in defending her sanctuary from invading spirits. Every 10 seconds, two weapon and stat options will refresh. Pay attention and react quickly to bolster your cute fishie (Phemie’s Designer: It’s not a fish, she’s a dragon, I’m weeping D:) and take down as many ghosties as you can.

Also, make sure to listen to the full title theme, because it's really beautiful!

This game was made as a part of the game jam Ludum Dare 51; the theme for this jam was "Every 10 Seconds".

How To Play

WASD to move, Q/E to choose your next weapon, and click to attack!

Every 10 seconds, the enemies will get stronger, you will receive a new weapon, and your stats will increase. Use Q/E to choose the weapon you will get, along with the stat that will get increased!

Credits

Thanks to everyone who worked on the game!!!
